raylee_odds_with_artifacts.rationale: With complete SOC portfolio demonstrating detection engineering, automation, and cross-platform hardening, significantly above entry-level baseline. May 1 deadline achievable with aggressive application strategy.

average_candidate_baseline.rationale: Typical candidate with Security+ cert and no hands-on lab experience. Huntsville market competitive but entry-level demand exists.

optimized_path_with_networking.rationale: Combine portfolio with LinkedIn networking, informational interviews, and targeted applications to SOC L1 roles. Attend Huntsville cybersecurity meetups, leverage veteran/career-transition resources if applicable.
